com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiImage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiItemSlot

    public class GuiImage
extends GuiContainer
    This GUI node allows for an image within a container. The image can be resized to fill the node dimensions.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Sprite icon
      The sprite icon.
      protected int iconSpacing
      The space between the container and the icon.
      protected boolean isAspectRatioKept
      If true the aspect ratio is kept when using isIconResized().
      protected boolean isIconResized
      If true the icon will be resized to fit this container.

      • Fields inherited from class com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer

        backgroundColor, outlineColor, outlineStroke

      • Fields inherited from class com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode

        isVisible, screen

      • getIconSpacing

        public int getIconSpacing()
        Returns the spacing between the icon and the node. isIconResized() must be true for this to have any effect.
        Returns:
        the spacing between the icon and the node.
